name: Championship Wrestling
overview: Arcade-style game about wrestling, featuring 8 different characters, like K.C. Colossus or Prince Vicious, and 25 different moves, like leg drops, spin kicks, body slams, rope bouncing, flying drop kicks and the so-called "infamous" atomic drop. You can even throw your opponent off the ring. Scoring is based on the complexity of your moves. The Plus4/C16 version only has two player vs. mode (no single player). It was also exclusively released in Europe by U.S. Gold and ported by Octasoft.
